name: AlignedCollectionViewFlowLayout
summary: A collection view layout that gives you control over the horizontal and vertical alignment of the cells.
description:
A collection view layout that gives you control over the horizontal and vertical cell alignment.
                        You can use it to align cells like words in a left- or right-aligned paragraph and
                        to specify how the cells are vertically aligned within their rows.
                        Other than that, the layout behaves exactly like Apple's UICollectionViewFlowLayout.
